entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of snow. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
